Repository Name Unauthorized: University of Texas at San Antonio Libraries Special Collections
Notes: Records of individuals, families, and organizations documenting the history and development of San Antonio and South Texas, including local African American, LGBTQ, and Mexican American communities; the history of women and gender in Texas, papers of politicians and activists, Tex-Mex and regional culinary history, urban development of San Antonio, and UTSA history. The rare book collection contains San Antonio authors and an extensive Mexican Cookbook collection, as well as works reflecting the development of the Texas-Mexico border region. Photograph collections include the San Antonio Light and Express-News photographs.
